term.title: imino carbenes

item.text: This term systematically means carbenes bearing an imino or N-substituted imino group, RN=, somewhere in the molecule. E.g. R–C:–CH2C(=NR)R. It is listed here in order to warn against its misuse for alkylideneamino carbenes.
